name: Transom
tagline: Transom is a Creative Agency in Seattle
description: Transom is a creative agency in Seattle Washington. Founded in 2012, it focuses on creating brands and visual identities, creating compelling stories to cultivate those brands, and designing and building websites that tell those stories. We also do quite a bit of stuff in between. If it needs to be designed, we can probably do it, and with over 30 years of branding, design, & development experience, itâ€™s likely we already have.
